docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
sudo docker network create <name-network> Make network default bridge

docker network ls Inspected network in docker.

docs.title: Developer Docker WSL.
docs.text:
It is better to use docker in wsl, because docker desktop consumes more ram memory and resources for the machine.

Get started with Docker remote containers on WSL 2

docs.title: Are Groups edible?
docs.text:
Groups are used to manage user permissions in the system. The $ groups command shows which groups your currently logged-in user belongs to.

groups
docker wheel heliezer

groups
heliezergoncalves sudo

docs.title: Adding a user, a group.
docs.text:
$ sudo usermod -aG <name_group> <name_user>

The flag -aG say to add the user in <name_user> at group <name_group>.

A widespread situation is a user in Linux Server needs privileges to make a sudo command. 

$ docker ps
Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket at unix:///var/run/docker.sock: Get "http://%2Fvar%2Frun%2Fdocker.sock/v1.24/containers/json": dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: permission denied
First create the group docker.

sudo groupadd docker

Add your user to the docker group.

sudo usermod -aG docker ${USER}

Maybe you need to log out and back in, for the group membership re-evaluated and accepted.

$ sudo docker ps
CONTAINER ID  IMAGE  COMMAND  CREATED  STATUS  NAMES

docs.title: Check Users in Server.
docs.text:
To check users in Server Linux, you need to execute any of the commands below.

$ cat /etc/passwd

$ less /etc/passwd

$ more /etc/passwd

docs.title: What is it ?
docs.text: It is a markup language you can use to format virtually any document. We can comparably like HTML, but it has a simple syntax.

docs.title: Markdown on the Mkdocs Types.
docs.text:
The Markdown has two different standards, with small changes between them.

  • Basic Syntax
  • Extended Syntax

Basic

HeaderCodeQuoteImagesItalicLinksOrdered listUnordered listBold 
# Title
## Subtitle
### h3

`xpto=1`

> Quote of Code

![name image](./my_image.jpg)

*in italic*

[DuckDuckGo](https://ddg.gg)

1. Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
2. Donec vitae suscipit est
3. Nulla tempor lobortis orci

* Sed sagittis eleifend rutrum
* Donec vitae suscipit est
* Nulla tempor lobortis orci

**Bold text**

Extended

Code BlockTablesTo-do listEmojiStrikethroughHighlighted 
    ```
    def funcao():
    return True
    ```

 | Name | Age |
 | ---- | ----- |
 | Heliezer | 39 |
 | Fausto   | 20 |

- [ ] Shop Foods
- [x] Write Article
- [ ] Improve library documentation

:snake: 🐍

~~Strikethrough~~

==highlighted==

docs.title: 📚 MkDocs - What do i do, How to do ?
What is this?
docs.text: Mkdocs is a static website generator built on , built in that uses markdown as the documentation format. Full customizable, can be hosted free on GitHub Pages, and Readthedocs etc ...

docs.title: Cli
docs.text:
The Cli is very simple and these are commands.

CLI

HelpStart projectLive ServerBuildDeploy 
mkdocs -h

mkdocs new <name_project>

mkdocs serve

mkdocs build

mkdocs gh-deploy

docs.title: Project Tree basic
docs.text:
Project tree is like example below:

.
├── docs # directory for the files .md
│    ├── index.md # Index start page
│   
└── mkdocs.yml # file to configuration mkdocks.
